> The title of this should PR follow the pattern "X.X.X - # Type of Release #" e.g. "3.0.0 - Feature"
> We can also append a short description of the release to the title if appropriate e.g. "3.0.0 - Feature (New Blocks)"

## Pre-Merge Checklist
> Review and action these items (where relevant) before merge. Please add any actions that are relevant to this specific release.

- [ ] Has all documentation been drafted and linked to below?
- [ ] Has all website/blog content been drafted and linked to below?
- [ ] Has a release window been agreed and communicated to the team?
- [ ] Has the stable branch been merged into this branch and tested?
- [ ] Has all QA/marketing feedback been implemented?
- [ ] Has the Product Manager reviewed, tested and approved these changes?
